Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: In Tuesday’s final against Tennessee, the Scarlet Knights will play for their first N.C.A.A. title in any sport since 1949.
snippet: In Tuesday’s final against Tennessee, the Scarlet Knights will play for their first N.C.A.A. title in any sport since 1949.
